markdown:
| icon           = poe2 goldrot_chew_icon.png
| description    = Taru Turu, literally "chew weed" to the Huana, is made from the root of the Ratiti plant. It is enjoyed by laborers, wayfarers, farmers, and all sorts who swear by the boost of energy it provides. Users who overindulge often find they feel sluggish and disoriented when they stop.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Quick item
| item_type      = Drug
| item_category  = Consumable
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no
| value          = 31
| shop_value     = 155
| keywords       = Drugs
| cast_time      = 1.6
| recovery_time  = 3.0
| noise_use      = Silent
| noise_impact   = Quiet
| duration       = 180.0
| effects        = +3 Constitution;+3 Might;+3 Dexterity
| crash_effects  = -5 Deflection (reduced by 0.15 per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/));-3 Might (reduced by 0.1 per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/));-3 Perception (reduced by 0.1 per point in [Alchemy](/alchemy/))
| level1_spells  =

| level3_spells  =

| location       = * [Port Maje](/portMaje/): Sold by [Norgund](/norgund/) in [The Kraken's Eye](/theKrakensEye/) upper floor.
* [Periki's Overlook](/perikisOverlook/): Sold by [Cuitztli](/cuitztli/) in [Cuitztli's Exotic Herbs](/cuitztlisExoticHerbs/).
* [The Gullet](/theGullet/), [Delver's Row](/delversRow/): Sold by [Street Merchant](/streetMerchantDelversRow/).
* [Ori o Koīki](/oriOKoiki/): In a crate next to the lift (x7).
| guid           =391e0903-aa1f-4fe7-89e4-295885d4fedc
}}
